summary: Completed e2e testing of Financial Tracker restructuring. All backend APIs pass (18/18 tests). Frontend UI verified for Accounts (no initial balance, Add Pocket button), Budgets (month navigator, copy feature), Gold (current price, Add Gold form with weight/type/price), and sidebar navigation (Pockets/Investments removed, Gold added).

minor.issue: Returns null instead of empty array when no budgets exist
Returns null instead of empty array when no assets exist
Returns null instead of empty array when no cards exist

action_items: Consider returning empty array [] instead of null for empty list responses in Go backend
critical_code_review_comments: Backend returns null for empty arrays - frontend handles this correctly but should be [] for consistency
Gold page title shows 'Emas' (Indonesian) which is correct per requirements
seed_data_creation: Gold price seeded at Rp 1,450,000/gram (verified working)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All restructuring features verified: 1) Accounts page has no initial_balance input, has Add Pocket button for sub-accounts. 2) Budgets page has month navigator with left/right arrows, Copy from Previous button, month-year picker. 3) Gold page shows current price from API (Rp 1,450,000/gram), has Add Gold button with form for weight, type (antam/ubs/galeri24/pegadaian/other), purchase price. 4) Sidebar has Dashboard, Accounts, Transactions, Budgets, Credit Cards, Gold (no Pockets, no Investments). 5) Account types: bank, wallet, cash, paylater (no credit_card).
